---
page-layout: custom
toc: false
---

<!-- 
  Split-panel layout for CircuitJS + documentation
  Uses consolidated circuitjs-docs.css and circuitjs-utils.js
-->
<link rel="stylesheet" href="circuitjs-docs.css">
<script src="circuitjs-utils.js"></script>
<script src="split-panel-resizer.js"></script>

<!-- Add class to html element for split-page-layout styles -->
<script>document.documentElement.classList.add('split-page-layout');</script>

<!-- Floating menu button -->
<button class="menu-toggle-btn" onclick="toggleMenuPanel()" title="Menu">
  <svg viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2">
    <line x1="3" y1="6" x2="21" y2="6"/>
    <line x1="3" y1="12" x2="21" y2="12"/>
    <line x1="3" y1="18" x2="21" y2="18"/>
  </svg>
</button>

<!-- Slide-out menu panel -->
<div class="menu-panel-overlay" onclick="toggleMenuPanel()"></div>
<div class="menu-panel">
  <h3>CircuitJS Docs</h3>
  <a href="user-guide.html">User Guide</a>
  <a href="electronics-tutorials.html">Electronics Tutorials</a>
  <a href="economics-tutorials.html">Economics Tutorials</a>
</div>

<script>
function toggleMenuPanel() {
  var panel = document.querySelector('.menu-panel');
  var overlay = document.querySelector('.menu-panel-overlay');
  panel.classList.toggle('open');
  overlay.classList.toggle('open');
}
</script>

<div class="split-container">

<!-- Left panel: Fixed iframe with CircuitJS -->
<div class="split-left">
<iframe src="../circuitjs.html?startCircuit=blank.txt&editable=true"
      width="100%" 
      height="100%" 
      frameborder="0"
      data-current-section="intro"
      title="CircuitJS1 Electronic Circuit Simulator">
</iframe>
</div>

<!-- Draggable resizer -->
<div class="split-resizer"></div>

<!-- Right panel: Scrolling content -->
<div class="split-right">
<iframe src="money-content.html"
      width="100%" 
      height="100%" 
      frameborder="0"
      style="overflow-y: auto; display: block;"
      title="Money First Principles Content">
</iframe>
</div>

</div>
